official_title: A bill to designate the border station at 9931 Guide Meridian, Lynden, Washington, as the "Kenneth G. Ward Border Station".

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Designates the border station at 9931 Guide Meridian Road, Lynden, Washington, as the Kenneth G. Ward Border Station.

titles.title: A bill to designate the border station at 9931 Guide Meridian, Lynden, Washington, as the "Kenneth G. Ward Border Station".
